Bridge Linetomorrow we will be using a different bridge line number The reason for this being that ATT offers Enron a lower rate of cents a minute vs cents a minute In order to access the bridge line you will use the following numbers Toll Free Dial in Number International AccessCaller Paid Dial in Number Host Code you will be accessing as a host versus participant in order to have access to the bridge line As usual if you need to reserve the bridge line please let me know Thanks Carmen Perez Government Affairs The Americas

Regulatory Global Update CallNonPrivilegedpst We will have a conference call twice monthly on Thursdays to talk about regulatory global issues The time of the call would be am CST and would take place in EB for those of you in Houston The dialing details are listed below as well as the dates of the call for the remainder of the year Dialin No HostParticipant Code International Dialin No Dates Thursday August Thursday August Thursday September Thursday September Thursday October Thursday October Thursday November Thursday December Thursday December Sue Nord Sr Director Government Affairs
